UI_TEXT.你好，欢迎使用ZML节点~\n本节点会将文本A和文本B结合后写入指定的TXT文件:
Hello, welcome to ZML Nodes~
This node combines Text A and Text B and writes them to a specified TXT file. If no path is specified, it will automatically save to the 'zml_w/txt/Text input' folder within the plugin.
If the path is a folder, it will write to '文本输入.txt' in that folder, creating the file if it doesn't exist.
You can also specify a path to a .txt file, but only .txt format is supported.
Wish you a pleasant and happy day~
UI_TEXT.文本为空，没有写入内容。\n文件位置: {abs_path}:
Text is empty, no content written.
File location: {abs_path}
UI_TEXT.路径格式不正确，请输入一个文件夹路径或.txt文件路径。: Incorrect path format. Please enter a folder path or a .txt file path.
UI_TEXT.JSON文件根目录不是一个字典。: JSON file root is not a dictionary.
UI_TEXT.ZML_PresetText 错误: 无法加载预设文件: {e}: ZML_PresetText Error: Failed to load preset file: {e}
UI_TEXT.你好，很高兴你使用ZML节点，到目前为止，你通过此节点总共转格式了{total_:
Hello, glad you are using ZML Nodes! So far, you have converted {total_count} images with this node!
If you don't want a title in the converted HTML file, you can choose 'Pure Image Output', which will result in an HTML file containing only the image.
There is a 30-character limit for the title. If exceeded, it will not be written.
Additional images are only enabled when 'Pure Image Output' is disabled. The additional image will be displayed to the left of the title. The node will also automatically adjust the resolution based on the aspect ratio of the additional image. For example, if your additional image is '400x200' but you select '200x200' resolution, the adjusted additional image will have a ratio of '200x100'. So, choose the additional image resolution carefully!
This node also supports combining images into GIFs. You can use the 'GIF File Path' node to load a GIF and then input it to this node to convert to HTML~
Alright then! Wish you a happy life and a happy day~
UI_TEXT.你好，很高兴你使用ZML节点: Hello, glad you are using ZML Nodes
UI_TEXT.到目前为止，你通过此节点总共转化了{total_count}次图像！祝你天天开心: So far, you have converted {total_count} images with this node! Wish you a happy day.
UI_TEXT.用英文逗号,分隔多个宽度值: Separate multiple width values with English commas
UI_TEXT.用英文逗号,分隔多个高度值: Separate multiple height values with English commas
UI_TEXT.你好，欢迎使用ZML节点~\n你可以在预设宽高框里输入你想要的分辨率，然后用英文:
Hello, welcome to ZML Nodes~
You can enter your desired resolutions in the preset width and height boxes, using English commas ',' to separate them. When the 'Index Value' is '0' or greater than the total number of values in the preset width/height boxes (default is three), the preset width and height output interfaces will randomly output values from the preset boxes. If the index value does not exceed the total number of values, it will output based on the corresponding index.
When 'Random Width/Height Correspondence' is enabled, width and height use the same index value. For example, if the first value in the default preset is randomly selected, the output will be '832x1216'. If the third value is selected, the output will be '1216x832'. When 'Random Width/Height Correspondence' is disabled, width and height are indexed independently, so you might randomly get '832x832' or '1216x1216'.
That's it! So simple! Thank you for using ZML Nodes, wish you a pleasant and happy day~

UI_TEXT.分类名、预设名称和内容不能为空，且分类名必须是固定类别之一。: Category name, preset name, and content cannot be empty. Category name must be one of the fixed categories.

UI_TEXT.在分类 '{category_name}' 中未找到名为 '{preset_na: Preset named '{preset_name}' not found in category '{category_name}'.
UI_TEXT.宽度和高度不能为空: Width and height cannot be empty
UI_TEXT.宽度和高度必须是整数: Width and height must be integers
